description_1: I’m a Barcelona-based software developer passionate about artificial intelligence, data processing, and self-hosted cloud infrastructure.
description_2: I build scalable AI systems, vector-powered search tools, and full-stack applications that combine open-source technologies with real-world automation.

experience.title: Technical and automation advisor
experience.description: Development and implementation of cloud computing infrastructure to host and deploy databases, frameworks, and AI models, along with the creation of APIs that connect these models to SQL and MongoDB databases, and the development of MVC-based programs for essential business tools.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: I worked on full-stack projects using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Python, and cloud tools like GCP and N8N. I contributed to automation workflows that integrated AI to optimize resources and reduce errors, developed intelligent chatbots, recommendation systems, and UI redesigns, gaining hands-on experience in agile development, DevOps, and cross-platform solutions.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: I contributed to the development of a web application designed to collect, analyze, and display real-time data from repeaters and access points deployed across industrial and construction sites, while also enabling remote device configuration and management.

principal.title: Self-publishing News Site
principal.description: The backend leverages AI to analyze articles, score their importance, group them into evolving event threads, and publish rewritten pieces in a consistent editorial voice, all with minimal to no human intervention. The frontend delivers a fast, readable news experience with dynamic updates.

principal.title: News Scraper
principal.description: A Python-based scraper that continuously inspects and extracts news articles from multiple sources, cleans and normalizes the content, and stores it in a structured database of news and events. Providing high-quality data for AI models used in classification, summarization, and automated publishing.

principal.title: The Pokemon APP
principal.description: Pokémon-themed web app that lets users explore, search, and view Pokémon with detailed cards, evolutions, and an AI-powered chat that combines role-play and assistant modes using an embedded data base as context tool, offering a dynamic, fast and immersive experience for Pokémon fans.
